title: Finding peace amidst the Stellenbosch mountains
text:
Matthew 11:28-30
“Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest. Take my yoke upon you and learn from me, for I am gentle and humble in heart, and you will find rest for your souls. For my yoke is easy and my burden is light.”

title: Jan & Hildegard du Plessis
text:
Jan Johannes du Plessis
Hildegard Wilhemina du Plessis née Schumann

title: Regina van Heerden
text: Oorspronklik van Barkly-Oos in die Oos-Kaap, maar baie jare in Stellenbosch gewoon. Om in Stellenbosch te woon met sy eikebome en omring deur die pragtige berge, was vir haar ’n groot vreugde.
